      • makeInputOutputLinkList

        private static void makeInputOutputLinkList(java.lang.String path)
        Read the linking of component outputs to component inputs from file. Output objects are from type ASimulationControl or APhysicalComponent, input objects from type APhysicalComponent.

        the file is required to adhere to the syntax target_component_name.input_name = component_name.output_name or target_component_name.input_name = source_simulation Comments have a leading '#' Spaces and tabs are allowed.

        The linklist is stored in connectionList

        Parameters:
        path - Path to the linking file

      • checkMachineConfig

        private static void checkMachineConfig()
        Check the machine config 1. Check: Every input of all machine componenets must be set exactly once in the connectionlist.

      • getUniqueComponentName

        public static java.lang.String getUniqueComponentName(java.lang.String prefix)
        Get unique component name. If the name stated in the argument already exists, a index number will be added and incremented
        Parameters:
        prefix - Varbiable prefix
        Returns:
        Unique component name

      • addMachineComponent

        public static void addMachineComponent(MachineComponent component)
        Add new component. The function is "name save": If a component with the same name exists, a unique new name will be generated
        Parameters:
        component - Component to be added

      • addNewMachineComponent

        public static MachineComponent addNewMachineComponent(java.lang.String mdlType,
                                      java.lang.String paramType)
        Adds a new (non existent) machine component by its model type and parameter set.
        Parameters:
        mdlType - model type name (same as class name)
        paramType - parameter set name
        Returns:
        created machine component object
